title: Revlum
author: Revlum
content: Hi everyone, I want to introduce to you a new type of offerwall - https://revlum.comThe offerwall (or App Wall, as we call it) works in a simple, but effective way. Your users can interact with challenges on the offerwall in exchange for rewards you select for them (e.g. in-app currency, premium content, subscriptions, etc.). Revlum will open a fully new revenue stream for you as the website/app owner, by allowing you to monetize your non-paying users in a non-intrusive way that actually increases the overall user experience and retention.@Advertisers - you can promote your apps, products, videos, services, and similar offerings through our offerwall, just create an account, upload your content, and run an efficient campaign.@Website/App owners - implement Revlum in a few minutes, and start collecting revenue that surpasses that of traditional ads. Revlum will be interesting to you as the website/app owner because we provide more earning methods than other offerwalls:Offers (classic mini-offers) - download app, create an account, etc.Surveys (premium survey providers)ShortlinksVisit Websites (PTC)YouTube Videos - users are paid to watch short parts of videosMini-Tasks (in development) - users leave reviews, follow on social media, etc.Our team will help you with the integration and customization where needed, or you can easily do it on your own - it takes only a few minutes.Enjoy it, and please reach out with questions  - hello@revlum.com
